summary: CAR DOOR IS SHUT AND ALERTS THAT DRIVER DOOR IS OPEN WHEN NOT MOVING AND DRIVING DOWN THE ROAD.  DOME LIGHTS WON'T GO OFF, CAN'T LOCK DOOR WITH KEY PAD ON DOOR.  ALARM CONTINUES TO GO OFF THAT DOOR IS AJAR WHEN IT'S NOT WHILE DRIVING DOWN THE ROAD. IT ONLY HAPPENED OCCASIONALY IN MAY, NOW TODAY 7/17/17 IT WILL NOT GO OFF, SHOWS DOOR IS AJAR ALL TIME!
